column4: Okay, I installed kubuntu desktop over normal ubuntu and accidently made it my default, how do I reset gdm to be the default?
Okay, I installed kubuntu desktop over normal ubuntu and accidently made it my default, how do I reset gdm to be the default?
how can you use kdm as a bootloader? :o
I mean the login screen is kubuntu, and the logo on grub is kubuntu
